Text:

The quality is very good; however, it appears to be grainy in parts. It is not noticeable and does not take away from the overall movie quality. Thank you uploader.
Thanx from me also. I have dvd rip but i rather watch 720p quality(less for download then 1080).
@ vivatpb5776 The graininess was in the original theater release. It's just due to how cameras handle the low light settings they were shooting in.
